title: Gynaecologie
description:
Guidelines and protocols are important sources of information for medical specialists (in training) and medical students. By correctly interpreting these resources, they provide the best care for their patients. Unfortunately, guidelines and protocols are often large, difficult to read documents, so finding specific content can be time-consuming. By interpreting the essence of these sources and modeling them in a user-friendly way, their use can relieve the burden on the healthcare provider. This benefits both the patient and the healthcare provider.

The 'Gyn app' is intended for all healthcare providers involved in the care of patients within gynaecology and obstetrics. It contains interpretations of guidelines, including interactive flow charts and handy calculators, which can also be saved as a 'favorite'.

The content of this app is checked every 2 months and updated when a guideline is revised. The app automatically keeps you informed of these new developments. This keeps you always up-to-date.

Disclaimer:
The "Gyn App" should only be used by medical specialists, physician assistants, interns and medical students. The app provides a clear overview of interpretations of various guidelines in the field of gynecology and obstetrics. The app is not intended to be used by patients. Patients are advised to always consult a doctor in case of complaints.
